title: What happened in 2020 in the United States? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: The most important thing that HAS happened is STILL happening. The Republican Party as exemplified by Trump and his administration is rapidly collapsing, primarily due to the combined effects of his behavior and incompetence, the nation’s awakening to the realities of the racism that’s STILL a huge problem, and the pandemic, in no particular order. It’s going to take a while, but the country will reverse course in many respects and get back to something approaching “ normal” starting soon.

Black Supremacy, Hating Law Enforcement, Hating White people, desecration of Federal property, Glorifying ghetto criminals & making them “Heroes”, Corona Virus from China that was probably done on purpose to try & ruin the Great Economy that was happening, False accusations made by some women who we are TOLD must be believed even though there is NO EVIDENCE etc. etc. Yeah, Not a good year.
